solution_line_template: He picked {num_bushels} bushels of corn and each bushel weighs {pounds_per_bushel} pounds so he picked {num_bushels}*{pounds_per_bushel} = <<{num_bushels}*{pounds_per_bushel}={total_pounds_corn}>>{total_pounds_corn} pounds of corn

Each ear of corn weighs {weight_per_ear} pounds and he has {total_pounds_corn} pounds of corn so he picked {total_pounds_corn}/{weight_per_ear} = <<{total_pounds_corn}/{weight_per_ear}={total_ears_corn}>>{total_ears_corn} ears of corn
